publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3786 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Standards Committee, The Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Act 2002: Consequential Changes to the Code of Conduct—That the Parliament agrees to amend the Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament in the manner indicated in Annex A of the Standards Committee’s 12th Report 2002, The Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Act 2002: Consequential Changes to the Code of Conduct, with effect from 30 January 2003.

S1M-3786 Mr Mike Rumbles on behalf of the Standards Committee: Standards Committee, The Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Act 2002: Consequential Changes to the Code of Conduct—That the Parliament agrees to amend the Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament in the manner indicated in Annex A of the Standards Committee’s 12th Report 2002, The Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Act 2002: Consequential Changes to the Code of Conduct, with effect from 30 January 2003.
S1M-3786 Standards Committee, The Scottish Parliamentary Standards Commissioner Act 2002: Consequential Changes to the Code of Conduct (lodged on 21 January 2003) Tricia Marwick*
